CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT and INV are already in the room
CHI looks all around the room not focussing on anything in particular

MOT turns and looks at CHI
CHI looks around the room . <aft> CHI smiles

INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 09:57:14
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table .INV puts the toys from Small Scale Activity away and she gives the brush toy to CHI hold onto
CHI hold the toy and watches INV
